attributes.action: Call in Judge Judy to go through the MPs expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is enough work to be done by those few MPs with any moral judgement, in getting the country back on its feet, to spare them in going through the MPs expense claims. Judge Judy would soon tell them what she thought of their "working to the rules".

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
